product.name: Jake
product.description: I am from Korea, I am willing to help students who are international student as well as local. I have already done a mentor in korea, so I think I will be a good mentor for you!

product.name: Sara
product.description: I come from Spain and I'm passionate about assisting international and local students alike. Having mentored in my hometown, I'm confident in being a supportive mentor for you!

product.name: Mohammed
product.description: Hailing from Saudi Arabia, I'm dedicated to aiding both international and local students. Having mentored previously, I believe I can be a valuable mentor for you!

product.name: Lina
product.description: Originally from France, I'm committed to supporting international and local students. With prior mentoring experience, I'm ready to be a reliable mentor for you!
product.review: "She was the best mentor in my life!" by Ameie
product.review2: "She is so meticulous thus taking care of me so well!" by Jaky

product.name: Ravi
product.description: Coming from India, I'm enthusiastic about aiding both international and local students. Having mentored previously, I believe I can offer valuable support as your mentor!
product.review2: "He explained some of my assignment with full explanation and let me understand!" by Jakey
